XII.i.3.A.5.e
.
Failure to Reduce an Award When Entitlement of an Additional Dependent Is Established
If VA fails to reduce a running award, when entitlement of an additional dependent has been established, this is considered an administrative error.
To rectify the error
make adjustments under
38 CFR 3.500(b)(2)
and
38 CFR 3.650(a)(2)
, and
prepare an administrative decision in accordance with
M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, 1.C
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section A - Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) Initial Authorization Issues
